name: Leave Me Alone! I'm Gaming!
description:
Game created in Unity for Brackeys' "Let There Be Chaos" game jam.

Post high scores in the comments! So far, mine is 818!   1015!   1156 1295!

How to Play:

1. Use the Space button to jump.

2. When in the air, press Space to rapidly fall down.

3. There are random events, follow the on screen prompts when they happen.

4. You can press the Esc key to return to the main menu.

5. Events happen 2 seconds after completion and you have 7 seconds to finish them.

6. Last as long as you can and get a high score!

Credits:

Art, code, and game by Mars On Fire
